```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(dplyr)

```





## What are we doing here?

```{r, eval=FALSE}
students <- 
  c("Jigar", "James", "Davin", "Timothy", "Theodore", "Gurlyn", 
    "William", "Helena", "Kelsey", "Sarah", "Brenda", "Alvaro", 
    "Shrif", "Jules", "Henry", "Nimrod", "Graham", "Trisha", 
    "Vaasu", "Patrick", "Leo", "Yuchen")
sample(students, 3)
```





## What are we doing here?

* The **sampling distribution** describes the distribution of these sample means.
* The **standard error** describes the variability of these sample means.
